short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to quickly and easily unsubscribe from YouTube channels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fast Unsubscribe is a simple yet effective Chrome extension that makes managing your YouTube subscriptions effortless. Designed with ease of use in mind, this tool allows you to quickly unsubscribe from channels without the repetitive hassle of manually confirming every action.

With Fast Unsubscribe, all you need to do is toggle the extension on from the toolbar. Once activated, the extension automatically detects the unsubscribe button on YouTube and clicks it for you, including confirming the action. This ensures that your subscriptions are updated quickly and efficiently, saving you time and effort.

Perfect for those who want to keep their YouTube feed clean and organized, this lightweight extension is built to work seamlessly in the background. Whether you're doing a major subscription cleanup or just removing a few channels, Fast Unsubscribe simplifies the process.

Its intuitive interface and hassle-free design make it ideal for users looking for a straightforward solution to manage their subscriptions. Install Fast Unsubscribe today and take control of your YouTube feed with ease!
